content:
TERM: Ethics and Values Framework

DEFINITION:
Strong ethical foundation for ArchE system operation

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Prioritizes human decision-making, dignity, and provides clear explanations

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Ensuring ArchE operates in responsible and beneficial manner

CATEGORY: EthicalFramework

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: EthicalFramework; respects: Human autonomy; protects: Human rights; ensures: Transparency and accountability; supports: Responsible AI operation; confidence: high
